name: SCNPhysicsShape.ShapeType
desc: Values for the type key specifying the level of detail that SceneKit uses when creating a physics shape based on a geometry.

items.name: static let boundingBox: SCNPhysicsShape.ShapeType
items.desc: The physics shape is the smallest box containing the geometry.

items.name: static let concavePolyhedron: SCNPhysicsShape.ShapeType
items.desc: The physics shape is a concave polyhedron closely following the surface of the geometry.

items.name: static let convexHull: SCNPhysicsShape.ShapeType
items.desc: The physics shape is a convex polyhedron roughly enclosing the geometry.
